titleStmt.title: Odes In imitation of the seauen penitential psalmes, vvith sundry other poemes and ditties tending to deuotion and pietie.
titleStmt.author: Verstegan, Richard, ca. 1550-1640.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed R.V., i.e. Richard Verstegan.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
